channel.title: Wow.. I really need help with this
channel.description: I'm desperate and I've been searching on how to disable the decline button in the second trade screen but no luck. Can someone help please?

item.title: Wow.. I really need help with this
item.dc:creator: @AfterLifeLochie AfterLifeLochie
item.description:
@AfterLifeLochie wrote:

Odd that you’d want to do that but it is possible (I think) by modifying the button’s action in your server. Just be aware that if you were to walk or move, it would also cancel the trade (as it does now). I’d be looking for the button action code and commenting it out. I’ll see if I can find the button ID.

Read full topic
item.source: Wow.. I really need help with this
